alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Clinton; Scott (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 5:59PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Scott, southwestern Clinton and central Cedar Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 558 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tipton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tipton, Lowden, Wheatland, Calamus, Bennett, Toronto, Buchanan, Clarence, Lyons, Cedar Valley, Bennett Park, Big Rock, Cedar Valley Park, Tipton Matthews Airport, Cedar County Fairgrounds, Sherman Park, and Walnut Grove Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
